data.actual_result: The new option overrides an existing option, if removing, the space for the option doesn't get removed
data.expected_result: The server menu should make an additional space for that the new option, if removing permissions, should remove space
data.short_description: Granting permission like manage server to a user who already has server menu open will override an option for new option
data.steps_to_repro: - Grant a permission that adds an option to the server menu - An option (maybe the first one) gets overwritten - If you revert the changes, it goes back to normal - If you remove a permission that adds an option to the server menu to someone who already has the server menu open then it'll remove that option without removing the space - Can be fixed by reopening the server menu
